attributes.action: Significantly raise the level of personal allowances, funded residents of Residential Care .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current level of personal allowance for a funded resident of residential care is set at £19.60.  This derisory amount affords no dignity or respect for funded residents who will only be funded in any case because of a lack of personal disposable funds. Residents should be able to meet all reasonable personal needs without anxiety or embarrasment as a basic human right.
